LanguageData.FatedExpectation.label: determinist expectation
LanguageData.FatedExpectation.description: Determinist sets their expectations based on what they perceive to be signs of their near future, rather than their materialistic situation. Will work harder when one has high expectations, and work slower when one has low expectations.
LanguageData.FatedExpectation.stages.very_low.label: very low
LanguageData.FatedExpectation.stages.low.label: low
LanguageData.FatedExpectation.stages.moderate.label: moderate
LanguageData.FatedExpectation.stages.high.label: high
LanguageData.FatedExpectation.stages.sky_high.label: sky high
LanguageData.VehementBuff.label: vehemence
LanguageData.VehementBuff.description: “Now if everyone will just stay out of my way, then nobody will get hurt.”
